flawed_nl_solution:
For the night he was able to intake 110 + 310 + 215 = <<110+310+215=635>>635 calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake 560 + 780 = <<560+780=1340>>1340 calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake 1340 + 635 = <<1340+635=1957>>1957 calories
Therefore, he can still intake 2500 - 1957 = <<543=543>>543 calories.
#### 543

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1975, not 1957. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
